meanings.definition: A woman who sells goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The saleswomen at the store were friendly and helpful.
meanings.sent2: The saleswomen worked hard to meet their targets.
meanings.sent3: The saleswomen decided to have a competition to see who could sell the most items in a day.
meanings.sent4: The saleswomen were like busy bees buzzing around the shop.
meanings.sent5: The image of the saleswomen with their bright smiles stayed in the customers' minds.

meanings.definition: Women who are employed to sell goods or services.
meanings.sent1: My aunt and her friends are all saleswomen at different stores.
meanings.sent2: The saleswomen in the department store wore professional attire.
meanings.sent3: The saleswomen organized a charity event to raise funds for a local cause.
meanings.sent4: The saleswomen were the backbone of the company's success.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the saleswomen was evident in their exceptional customer service.
